Class FileBrowser

Class to handle selection of input, and by derivation or selection, and output file, the names of which are made available publicly Public functions:- Select folder Select Manual Log File Create Output File

| Improve this Doc View Source

ProcessFolder(String)

Processes the folder. Called when a new folder is to be dealt with. If there is a manifest file, copies the file names from that into the file list. if not, then copies names of all .txt files except .log.txt files. if there are still just 0 or 1 file in the list, try to extract comment files from a log file

Declaration
public string ProcessFolder(string folder)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String folder

The folder.
Returns
Type Description
System.String
| Improve this Doc View Source

SelectFile(String, String, String, Boolean)

Generic Open file function. Can be passed an initial directory or NULL to use the application home directory, a fileTypeFilter to chose what types of file to display/select and a boolean to set if it is desired to be able to select multiple files. Returns a List of String containing the selected fully qualified filenames. Filter inn the form "foobar (.foo)|.foo|barfoo (.bar)|.bar"

Declaration
public static List<string> SelectFile(string title, string initialPath, string fileTypeFilter, bool multiSelect)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String title

The title of the dialog box
System.String initialPath

The Directory to open initially or NULL
System.String fileTypeFilter

The filter parameters for what type of file to select
System.Boolean multiSelect

TRUE for multi file selection
Returns
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.List<System.String>
